A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: SJW bulls!*$t and plot lines written without ADHD medication lead to one of the most disappointing movies I have seen in my life. Luke Skywalker\, one of the most well known and beloved movie heroes\, ruined. Rey\, a Mary Sue\, completely uncompelling and irrelevant. Laia\, a space superman now? This movie was filled with crappy slap-stick humor and tragically missed potential. Mark Hamill\, I'm sorry they ruined this Star Wars so irredeemably in your life time.
